question:
Last month you had a holiday overseas where you stayed with some friends. They have
just sent you some photos of your holiday.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter
● thank them for the photos and for the holiday
● explain why you didn’t write earlier
● invite them to come and stay with you
text: I hope this letter finds you in radiant health and high in spirit. I have recently received an envelope full of pictures from our holiday to your county.

Firstly, I would like to appreciate you guys for the amazing pictures we had during the journey. Additionally, it was one of the best trips I ever had in my life, as it was a new country for me I learn a lot more because of companions like you. The best moment I cannot forget is when we had a wonderful ride on a toboggan.

Apart from it, I would also like to apologise to you for not giving a revert to your emails. The moment I came back, I had a lot of pendency at my workplace because I took a week off from it. In addition to it, my manager wanted the reports as soon as possible. Furthermore, I request you to visit my country as from now it is a great time to spend here. It is said that after the month of August is known as a festival season for India and it would also be a great moment to visit as well as, we can spend a whale of a time
